div.p: To the laographoi of the village of Soknopaiou Nesos from Hatres, son of Satabous, the son of Panephremmis, mother Segathis, from the village of S[ok]nopaiou Nesos. I register myself and my family for the house-by-house registration of the past 23rd year of the God Aelius Antoninus, in the house, in which I live, which is in the village and is inherited from my mother. And I am the above mentioned Hatres, 25 years old, without a distinguishing mark and (I register) my wife Isarion, father unknown, mother Tanephremmis, daughter of Panomieus, there belong to her in the village two houses and her grandmother’s quarter (inheritance). And (I register) Tapetsiris, daughter of Stotoetis, the son of Panephremmis, mother Tapetsiris, 12 years old, without a distinguishing mark. There belong to Tapetsiris two houses and a courtyard and her grandfather’s quarter of the two houses and here grandmother’s quarter (of the two houses). Therefore I submit this registration. Year 1 of Imperator Caesar Marcus Aurelius Antoninus Augustus and Imperator Cae[sar] Lucius Aurelius Verus Augustus, Mesore 4.
